body: At 18 level, a preservationist adds summon nature's ally IX to his formula book as a 6th-level extract. This ability replaces his 18th-level discovery.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Alchemist/Alchemist Archetypes/Preservationist/Bottled Ally VI
name: Bottled Ally VI
